name: As the Light Transcends
description:
[Game Entry for Mini Jam 103: Darkness]

Game Made using Godot

Game Info:

Control a fragile Light bearing crystal, in the hopes of returning the light up in a pitch black world.

The weight of light  encumbers the crystal, making it sensitive to impact and therefore very fragile.

Guide the crystal to the ascension of light without harming it.

Current total levels: 20

Note: Might be laggy on some devices (due to the amount of particles on screen)

CHANGELOG:

v0.1a

  • Reduced delay before the crystal can be moved again (from 2sec to 0.5 sec)
  • Fixed bug where if the player pressed two buttons at the same time, 2 moves where deducted even when the move is only done once.
  • Added Music "Solace" by Scott Buckley (CC-BY) https://www.scottbuckley.com.au/library/solace/

v0.1

  • Game submitted for Mini Jam 103: Darkness
